snippet: A live television show hosted by Jamie Kennedy on New Year’s Eve ended in apparent crowd chaos onstage and became a YouTube sensation.
abstract: Live New Year's Eve telecast hosted by comedian and actor Jamie Kennedy in Los Angeles and broadcast on independent television station KDOC ended in apparent crowd chaos onstage and became a YouTube sensation; Kennedy claims that mayhem was intentional, but viewers are debating which parts were intentional or accidental.
lead_paragraph: A live television show hosted by Jamie Kennedy on New Year’s Eve ended in apparent crowd chaos onstage and became a YouTube sensation.

headline.seo: Jamie Kennedy’s ‘First Night’ on New Year’s Eve
headline.main: Ringing in the Year With Stage Bedlam
headline.print_headline: Ringing In The Year With Stage Bedlam
